title: Longhorns Daily News : Texas DB Jahdae Barron is a Thorpe Award semifinalist
body_text:
Fourth-year Texas Longhorns defensive back Jahdae Barron has been named a Thorpe Award semifinalist. The honor is awarded annually to college football’s top defensive
